author: econoar
content: hey all, I have a bunch of altona validators that I'm looking to take down but just wanted to check in and see if people are still relying on this. If I take them down, the network will stop finalizing.

author: prestonvanloon
content: Hi Eric, let's exit those validators so your departure from Altona is not so volatile. I'll connect with you on DM to help exit everything properly. Thanks!
